Articles.Content:
I heard from a colleague at a nearby observatory they spotted an asteroid. It was confirmed by a professional team in Hawaii. The impact will happen in Mexico City. This is no joke. If the developers don't evacuate, there will never be any other versions of the game. They're contemplating wether to tell the inhabitants, spreading fear, causing looting, murder & even more crime in general. The only thing you don't need to fear:

(It's April Fools Day!)
Well I don't know where Russell's Teapot is, but where I live it's April 2nd.
Everyone fear the asteroid. KSP redirect mission any1?
Squad has been stocking up, in preparation for the apocalypse.
